keyMoments.title: Campacino Arrives to Rescue Brindo
keyMoments.description: Campacino arrives at the Phoenix Pirates' ship via a magnetic ice platform to rescue his captured twin brother from captivity.
keyMoments.significance: First on-screen appearance of Campacino in the Ice Hunter Arc, introducing his character and magnetic abilities.
keyMoments.quote: Where is my brother? I'm coming to get you!

keyMoments.title: Twins' Magnetic Combination Play Revealed
keyMoments.description: Campacino and Brindo reveal their unique 'Combination Play' ability where their brotherly bond creates magnetic attraction.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a unique fighting technique based on twin bond rather than Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.quote: Our brotherly love creates magnetism between us! This is our Combination Play!

abilities.description: A magnetic ability shared with twin brother Brindo that allows them to attract or repel each other. Campacino glows blue while Brindo glows red.
A coordinated technique using magnetic powers with his twin brother.

relationships.description: Twin brother. Their brotherly bond creates their magnetic powers.

evolutionMoments.description: Campacino arrives to rescue Brindo, demonstrating their strong bond.

relationships.description: Father. Campacino is the eldest son of Don Accino.

reveals.information: Possesses magnetic powers through brotherly bond with Brindo

keyMoments.title: Twins' Magnetic Combination Play Revealed
keyMoments.description: Brindo and Campacino reveal their unique 'Combination Play' ability where their brotherly bond creates magnetic attraction.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a unique fighting technique based on twin bond rather than Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Twins Separate Luffy From His Crew
keyMoments.description: Using magnetic powers, the twins force Luffy away from the Phoenix Pirates' ship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the tactical effectiveness of the twins' combination attacks.

abilities.description: A magnetic ability shared with twin brother Campacino. Brindo glows red while Campacino glows blue, allowing magnetic attraction and repulsion.

relationships.description: Twin brother. Their brotherly bond creates their magnetic powers.
Father. Brindo is the second son of Don Accino.

reveals.information: Possesses magnetic powers through brotherly bond with Campacino

keyMoments.title: Zoro Enters Don Accino's Chamber
keyMoments.description: Zoro encounters Don Accino in an intensely hot chamber within Lovely Land and shares drinks with him.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the confrontation between Zoro and the arc's main antagonist.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hat Jolly Roger Presented to Don Accino
keyMoments.description: Zoro witnesses the stolen Straw Hat flag being delivered to Don Accino and learns of the villain's true intentions.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the central conflict of the arc and exposes Don Accino's deception.

reveals.information: Don Accino mentions Zoro's 120,000,000 berry bounty

keyMoments.title: Zoro Enters Don Accino's Chamber
keyMoments.description: Don Accino meets with Zoro in his hot chamber, pretending to be friendly while planning to capture him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Don Accino's deceptive nature and sets up the major confrontation.
keyMoments.quote: Let me show you my collection of pirate flags. I've gathered quite a few over the years.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hat Jolly Roger Presented to Don Accino
keyMoments.description: Don Accino receives the stolen Straw Hat flag and reveals his knowledge of Zoro's identity and bounty.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Don Accino's true intentions and knowledge.
keyMoments.quote: I knew who you were all along, Roronoa Zoro. That 120,000,000 berry bounty of yours is quite hard to pass up.

relationships.description: Father of Campacino, his eldest son.
Father of Brindo, his second son.

keyMoments.title: Puzzle Offers Himself as Ransom
keyMoments.description: Captain Puzzle demonstrates his care for his crew by offering himself to the Accino Family in exchange for his crew's freedom.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Puzzle's character development and genuine desire to protect his crew.

bounties.reason: Pirate activities in the New World

relationships.description: Captain of the Phoenix Pirates who cares deeply for his crew.

evolutionMoments.description: Offers himself as ransom for his crew's safety.

reveals.information: Has a bounty of at least 100,000,000 berries
Willing to sacrifice himself for his crew
